summary: PatchEmbed converts a 2D image tensor into a sequence of flattened patch embeddings by splitting the image into fixed-size patches, applying a linear projection to each patch, and optionally normalizing the resulting token vectors.
business_intent: Facilitate the preprocessing step for vision transformer architectures by providing an efficient, configurable way to tokenize images into patch embeddings suitable for downstream computer vision tasks such as classification, detection, and segmentation.
